STORMOND_CONFIG_TABLE.desc: Config DB interval parameters for Storage Monitoring Daemon

STORMOND_INVALID_POLLING_INTERVAL.desc: Configure an invalid daemon polling interval

STORMOND_INVALID_SYNC_INTERVAL.desc: Configure an invalid fsstats file sync interval

STORMOND_POLLING_INTVL_BAD_LEN_MAX.desc: Configure an invalid daemon polling interval: out of range value

STORMOND_SYNC_INTVL_BAD_LEN_MAX.desc: Configure an invalid fsstats file sync interval: out of range value

STORMOND_SYNC_INTVL_EMPTY_VALUE.desc: Configure an empty file sync interval

STORMOND_POLLING_INTVL_EMPTY_VALUE.desc: Configure an empty file sync interval
